metadata.title: Tariff Tracker | TradeNavigatorPro
metadata.description: Monitor tariff changes, compare rates across countries, and receive alerts for your key HTS codes.

TariffTracker.title: Tariff Tracker

search.title: Search HTS Codes
search.placeholder: Search by code, description or category
search.noResults: No HTS codes found matching your search

watchlist.title: Watchlist

details.selectHtsCode: Select an HTS code to view details

overview.noRates: No tariff rates found for the selected criteria

trends.title: Historical Tariff Trends
trends.historicalNote: Data shown represents historical tariff rates over the past 12 months
trends.forecastDescription: Based on historical patterns and current geopolitical factors, our AI predicts potential tariff changes
trends.forecastWarningContent: Forecasts are estimates only and should not be the sole basis for business decisions. Always consult with a trade compliance expert.

comparison.title: Country Comparison
comparison.savingsDescription: Calculate potential savings by switching sourcing countries

regulations.title: Regulations & Compliance
regulations.usmcaDescription: Goods that qualify under USMCA rules of origin from Mexico and Canada may be eligible for duty-free treatment.
regulations.section301Description: Additional duties on certain products from China under Section 301 of the Trade Act of 1974.
regulations.complianceItem1: Proper HTS classification is legally required and the importer's responsibility
regulations.complianceItem2: Maintain documentation supporting country of origin claims for 5 years
regulations.complianceItem3: Special certifications may be required for certain trade agreements
regulations.complianceItem4: Penalties for misclassification can include fines and seizure of goods

metadata.title: Supply Chain Planner | TradeNavigatorPro
metadata.description: Plan, optimize, and monitor your supply chain with real-time insights and risk management tools.

SupplyChainPlanner.title: Supply Chain Planner
SupplyChainPlanner.description: Manage your inventory, assess supply chain risks, forecast demand, and optimize your supply network.

inventory.title: Inventory Management
inventory.description: Track inventory levels, manage reorder points, and optimize stock levels.
inventory.searchPlaceholder: Search items by name, SKU or description
inventory.noItems: No inventory items found. Add your first item to get started.
inventory.name: Item Name

risks.multipleSelectHint: Hold Ctrl/Cmd to select multiple options
risks.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this risk? This action cannot be undone.

forecasting.title: Demand Forecasting
forecasting.description: Predict future demand and optimize inventory levels.
forecasting.addItemsFirst: Add inventory items first to create forecasts
forecasting.orderRecommendation: Order {units} units for optimal inventory levels (approx. {cost}).
forecasting.orderTimingRecommendation: Place your next order within {days} days to maintain optimal stock levels.
forecasting.seasonalTrendsDescription: This chart shows the seasonal demand patterns based on historical data and industry trends.
forecasting.selectItemPrompt: Select an item from the dropdown to view forecasts and recommendations

visualization.title: Supply Chain Visualization
visualization.description: Visualize your supply chain network and identify bottlenecks or risks.
visualization.recommendation1: Establish backup suppliers for critical components from high-risk regions
visualization.recommendation2: Reduce lead times by 15% by optimizing shipping routes
visualization.recommendation3: Monitor geopolitical situation in Southeast Asia for potential disruptions

planning.title: Interactive Planning
planning.description: Create and test supply chain scenarios to optimize your operations.
